package.name: jMCS
package.description: jMCS (JMMC GUI Homogeneity Framework) is the JMMC toolkit to provide better user interface and platform integration across Mac, Linux and Windows

package.name: CDS_SpType
package.description: Get information from spectral type of stellar objects. Provided by CDS

package.name: commons-math
package.description: Commons Math is a library of lightweight, self-contained mathematics and statistics components addressing the most common problems not available in the Java programming language or Commons Lang.

package.name: CERN colt
package.description: provides a set of Open Source Libraries for High Performance Scientific and Technical Computing in Java
